name: Pen D Man
description:
Kids and adults will love our new Pen D Man line action game.

We are very happy and excited to release this game to the App Store and we hope you like it as much as we do.

Your mission whether you choose to accept it, is to ensure the PenDMan always have a line to walk on.

Swipe the screen to draw lines for the PenDMan. Help him stay on the line, avoid obstacles and collect game goodies.
the goal of the game is to progress through the different levels while gaining as many points as possible for each level.
Bonus Points are awarded for:
- Completing a level
- Saving Ink
- And off course Collecting as many coins as you can

“Haven’t had so much fun for a long time. Simple, intuitive, addictive and interesting game. Thank you”

“Wow wow wow. Simple idea yet challenging. Everyone can find different aspect of the game interesting”
